profile.description: With +4 years of experience, i dedicated myself to functional software development using modern technologies to resolve real world problems, with product vision and clean code practices, applying design and architecture patterns, and contributing to a positive user experience

technologies.title: Skills & Technologies
technologies.description: These are some of the technologies I consider most important and with which I regularly work when carrying out productive developments

items.jobDescription: I developed some functionalities in a web-based healthcare system, contributing to task planning and estimation, with critical thinking and a focus on user experience. I also contributed to bug fixes and component creation and updates alongside an excellent design team.

I migrated a healthcare web app to a mobile platform using React Native and Expo. I implemented integrations with Google Fit and Health Kit to monitor relevant metrics and draw data-driven insights, achieving a seamless user experience. I coordinated deployments for the App Store and Google Play.

jobAchivements: I strengthened my knowledge in React
I make and learn stored procedures
